```{r load_packages, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE} 
library(dplyr)
library(fontawesome)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
```

```{r eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
unchecked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("circle", fill = "#e4e4e4", height = "15px"))

checked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("check-circle", fill = "#428bca", height = "15px"))

wk_post <- tibble(
  

"Data Camp" = c(unchecked,
                unchecked,
                unchecked,
                unchecked,
                unchecked,
                checked),

"eCampus" = c(unchecked,
              unchecked,
              unchecked,
              unchecked,
              unchecked,
              unchecked),

"R" = c(unchecked,
        checked,
        unchecked,
        unchecked,
        unchecked,
        checked),

"Slack" = c(unchecked, 
              unchecked, 
              unchecked,
              checked,
              checked,
              unchecked),

"To Do" = c("Look over the syllabus",
            "Sign up for RStudio.cloud or download and install both R and RStudio",
            "Read Borgatti, Mehra, Brass, & Labianca (2009) and both Chapters 1 and 2 in Scott (2017)",
                "Join the class Slack channel after recieving an invite and introduce yourself",
                "Define a social network",
                "Begin the *Introduction to R* module on Data Camp"),

Location = c("[Link](/syllabus/)",
             "[Link](/tasks/01-tasks/#class-software)",
             "[Link](/readings/01-reading/#literature)",
             "[Link](/tasks/01-tasks/#class-slack-account-access)",
             "[Link](/01-tasks/#postings)",
             "[Link](https://www.datacamp.com/){target='_blank'}")
)
```
